name: Fantasy Mosaics 26: Fairytale Garden
description:
Taking a walk in the woods, the penguin family comes across a magic book that takes them to a fairytale garden!
They're waiting for you to help them explore this wonderful place while enjoing the new collection of colorful mosaic puzzles!
Follow the penguins into the magical world of logic and fairytales!


- Colorful mosaic puzzles

- Interactive creatures

- Explore the fairytale garden

- Puzzles based on logic
